quotes: When life gives you lemons, make lemonade.
When in Rome.
Defence is the greatest offence. Offence is the greatest defence
Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
Some live to love. Others love to live
C'est la vie.
Slow and steady wins the race.
With great power, comes great responsibility.
The calm before the storm.
All is fair in love and war.
A captain will never abandon his crew. That's what it means to be a pirate.
Mind over matter. Matter over mind.
Don't hate the player, hate the game.
Sing like nobody is listening. Dance like nobody is watching.
Honor your mother and father.
Save your money. Your money will save you.
Blood is thicker than water.
Mi casa es su casa.
Monkey see, monkey do.
There is no 'I' in 'Team'.
Watch your step and your step will watch you.
Keep your friends close and your enemies closer.
Eyes on the prize.
Keep it simple, stupid.
You can’t stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
When life hands you lemonade, don’t try to make lemons.
If you have a lemon, make a lemonade.
I believe when life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade…
When life gives you lemons, sell them.
When life gives you lemon, take it.
If life gives you lemons, don’t settle for simply making lemonade.
It’s not what happens to you, but how you handle it. If Life gives you lemons, make lemonade.
When life gives you lemons, you don’t make lemonade.
As long as you keep moving forward, and don't look back, the forward will move not back keep look back, as forward long as move will.
